name: Steel World War Melt Down: Ultimate Robots Fighting
name_original: Steel World War Melt Down: Ultimate Robots Fighting
description:
Steel World War Melt Down is an action-packed game based on FPS. In which you shoot down the robots and clear your compound from Robots.
Game is on wave system in which you shoot all robots. when a wave completed, a new wave come with new robots and more energy.
Simple controls make this game easy to learn, and the beautiful 3D action depicts some truly epic fights! Everyone can enjoy this fighting game.

How to play
Touch and swipe the screen to view the Robots
Take your aim
Shoot down the Robots
attack, defend
Simple controls involving touching and swiping the screen.


Features

multiple weapons to shoot down aliens robots
rocket launcher for ultimate shoot down
Customise your weapons
Different types of waves
